radiographic_examinations.findings: Appendix is distended, measuring up to 1.5 cm, and hyperemic with wall thickening and adjacent fatty stranding and edema. Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. Liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, kidneys, urinary bladder, distal ureters, gastrointestinal tract, and reproductive organs are unremarkable with no focal lesions or significant abnormalities.
